Patreon only: $30+ life time Patreon member will receive a free Steam key when this game is released

A Free Demo can be downloaded here: https://lilhuskyvr.itch.io/1234-demo

Join my Discord: https://lilhuskyvr.com/discord 

Features Free Full Equipment (Clothing) Mode Full Full, Partial, None Game Mode
